config.hint: Search for a parcel by APN or Address

config.text:
Welcome to the Tahoe Best Management Practices (BMP) Mapping Tool


The BMP Map Viewer can be used to

  • View visible layers in a legend and turn on or off APN Labels, Catchments, and uploaded shapefiles
  • Locate and zoom to an area by entering in an address (or part off), APN, or catchment name
  • Select parcels by drawing an area or entering catchment name
  • Export the attributes of a selection to excel Upload a shapefile that has been compressed to a .ZIP file
  • Export a PDF Map
Query Parcels by Catchment, Area Wide, or by drawing a Project Area

Welcome to the Tahoe Best Management Practices (BMP) Mapping Tool


The BMP Map Viewer can be used to

  • View visible layers in a legend and turn on or off APN Labels, Catchments, and uploaded shapefiles
  • Locate and zoom to an area by entering in an address (or part off) or APN.
  • Select parcels by drawing an area or entering catchment name
  • Export the attributes of a selection to excel
